< p > Morning Joe host Mika Brzezinski was sharply critical Thursday of Rudy Giuliani — President Donald Trump 's lawyer — after [ARG0: he] [V: made] [ARG1: disparaging comments about the appearance of Stormy] Daniels.</p >
